channel.title: How to make a player drop something everytime they die
channel.description:
I want to make it so every time a player dies there is a 100% chance that the player will drop a certain item. This item I want the player to drop is Tokul but it doesn't really matter I just want to know how to make a player drop something every time he dies. Any help is greatly appreciated
-Thanks
